title: How do I connect to my TalkBand B2 with another phone?
answer: Your TalkBand B2 will connect automatically to devices it has paired with before. If you want to connect to another phone, press and hold the side button while your TalkBand B2 is turned on and touch the Bluetooth icon on the screen to enter pairing mode. On your phone, touch HUAWEI B2-XXX in the Bluetooth device list to connect.
